uploadAreaDescription: Drag & drop your JSON theme file here, or click to select.
step1Description: Upload your VSCode theme JSON file.
step2Description: The tool analyzes the theme structure.
step3Description: Convert and download the Xcode theme.
installationGuideText: After downloading, copy the `.xccolortheme` file to the following Xcode directory and restart Xcode:
disclaimerText: Please note that due to differences between VSCode and Xcode theming systems, a perfect 1:1 color and token mapping might not always be possible. Some manual adjustments in Xcode might be needed for optimal results.
